name: Moonblast
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Special. If Fairy Dust Weather is active roll 1 Chance die to inflict the Foe with a random status from Poison, Burn, Frostbite or Paralysis (e.g. by using the /select_random command).
description: Summon power directly from the moon. The Pokemon blasts the foe with light.
